title: Announcing TechDocs: Spotify’s docs-like-code plugin for Backstage
description: Since we open sourced Backstage, one of the most requested features has been for a technical documentation plugin. Well, good news. The first open source version of TechDocs is here. Now let’s start collaborating and making it better, together.

prevItem.title: Backstage has been accepted into the CNCF Sandbox
